subject: ctdb logo - anyone feeling creative?
body:
I've just created a really lousy logo for CTDB on
http://ctdb.samba.org/. If anyone has is good with the gimp and can
think of something better then please let me know!

Something related to clustering, Samba, disks, databases etc would be
good. 

Hmm, maybe we could start with the standard Samba logo and put CTDB on
it somewhere? Maybe in the bottom right corner?

Cheers, Tridge
